00162 template<class T>
00163 void ArrayList<T>::increaseSize() {
00164 
00165     T* list2 = new T [capacity*2];
00166     for(int i = 0; i < capacity; i++) {
00167         list2[i] = list[i];
00168     }
00169     delete [] list;
00170     list = list2;
00171     capacity = capacity*2;
00172 }

00204 ArrayList<T>& ArrayList<T>::operator =(const ArrayList<T>& other) {
00205

00207 
00208         delete [] list;
00209         list = new T[other.capacity];
00210         for(int i=0; i < other.capacity; i++) {

00239 template<class T>
00240 void ArrayList<T>::add(T t) {
00241 
00242     if(currentSize == capacity-2) {
00243         increaseSize();
00244     }
00245     list[currentSize] = t;
00246     currentSize++;
00247 }

00250 template<class T>
00251 void ArrayList<T>::add(int i, T t) {
00252 
00253     if(currentSize == capacity-2) {
00254         increaseSize();
00255     }
00256     for(int j=currentSize; j>i; j--) {
00257         list[j] = list[j-1];
00258     }
00259     list[i] = t;
00260     currentSize++;
00261 }

00278 template<class T>
00279 T ArrayList<T>::remove(int i) {
00280 
00281     T obj = list[i];
00282     for(int j = i; j <= currentSize; j++) {
00283         list[j] = list[j+1];
00284     }
00285     currentSize--;
00286     return obj;
00287 }

00291 T ArrayList<T>::remove(T t) {
00292 
00293     int pos = 0;
00294     while(pos < currentSize) {
00295         if(list[pos] == t) {
00296             return remove(pos);
00297         }
00298         pos++;
00299     }
00300     return T();
00301 }
